title: Getting Started
content: # Gettings started with Mixeway Installation of Mixeway is pretty straight forward. All you need is OpenSSL (or valid SSL Certificates) and docker-compose command, then clone repo * Clone Repo ``` git clone https://github.com/Mixeway/MixewayHub ``` * initialize variables (prepare certificates). You can run this step manually by putting SSL certificates in pki directory ``` cd MixewayHub ./setup.sh ``` This operation will create certificates keys and key stores under `pki` directory and then just set `environment` variables which are being set at dockers. * Make sure Vault and DB are up and running. * Pull and run docker-compose ``` docker-compose pull docker-compose up -d ``` which will run the Mixeway in background. * Finally, use Your browser to navigate to ``` https:// ```
